thread.title: Chloe Ferry continues her bid to become Kylie Jenner with new hair extensions range
thread.title_full: Chloe Ferry continues her bid to become Kylie Jenner with new hair extensions range

author: Lara Martin
title: Chloe Ferry continues her bid to become Kylie Jenner with new hair extensions range
text:
Chloe Ferry continues her bid to become Kylie Jenner with new hair extensions range Geordie Shore star has launched her own brand of hair extensions Share Chloe Ferry Hair Extensions (Photo: www.myhairrevolution.com) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Celebrity Big Brother housemate Chloe Ferry 's made no secret of her admiration for Kylie Jenner . 
And now she's following in the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star's footsteps by launching her very own range of hair extensions. 
“My hair inspirations are Cheryl Cole and Kylie Jenner," said Chloe, 21. Chloe hopes to have a huge success with her hair extensions range (Photo: www.myhairrevolution.com) Striking a pose in the publicity photos (Photo: www.myhairrevolution.com) 
"They both look flawless, one of them is a fellow Geordie and the other is just amazing!” said Chloe. “Kylie’s business empire is one which I aspire to follow, next year I have so many more products coming out”. 
Geordie Shore star Chloe's new brand is called Hair Revolution and is released online and via the high street this year. 
She says it features 15 different shades which match all hair colours Chloe named Cheryl and Kylie Jenner as her style icons (Photo: www.myhairrevolution.com) Chloe says Kylie's an inspiration to her (Photo: Getty) Chloe also praised Cheryl's style 
“This is one of many things I have going on for next year," said Chloe. "I get girls asking me for my style tips and how I do my hair on a daily basis so I have put my money and time into the project to make this one of my business ventures”. 
It follows her Chloe Ferry Cosmetics range, launched in 2016. 
She released a range of six lip glosses in October and has big plans to expand the business in the year to come. Chloe has big plans for the new year (Photo: www.myhairrevolution.com) Chloe was evicted from CBB on Friday night (Photo: Channel 5) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
